scenario: Alice received the following amounts during the year: Life Insurance Proceeds (Death): $49,078.62, Loan Proceeds: $38,909.79, Gift from Parents: $12,765.05, Wages: $19,079.56.
question: Calculate Alice's gross income under I.R.C. § 61.
answer_explanation: Gross income includes all income from whatever source derived, unless excluded. Total: $19,079.56.
reasoning: Summed included items, ignored excluded items.
